name: Annie
title: the Dark Child
lore: Dangerous, yet disarmingly precocious, Annie is a child mage with immense pyromantic power. Even in the shadows of the mountains north of Noxus, she is a magical outlier. Her natural affinity for fire manifested early in life through unpredictable, emotional outbursts, though she eventually learned to control these “playful tricks.” Her favorite includes the summoning of her beloved teddy bear, Tibbers, as a fiery protector. Lost in the perpetual innocence of childhood, Annie wanders the dark forests, always looking for someone to play with.
blurb: Dangerous, yet disarmingly precocious, Annie is a child mage with immense pyromantic power. Even in the shadows of the mountains north of Noxus, she is a magical outlier. Her natural affinity for fire manifested early in life through unpredictable...
allytips: Storing a stun for use with her ultimate can turn the tide of a team fight.
Striking killing blows on minions with Disintegrate enables Annie to farm extremely well early in the game.
Molten Shield is a good spell to cast to work up to Annie's stun, so sometimes it's beneficial to grab at least 1 rank in it early.
enemytips: Annie's summoned bear, Tibbers, burns opposing units around himself. Try to keep your distance from him after he's been summoned.
Summoner Smite can be used to help take down Tibbers.
Keep an eye out for a white, swirling power around Annie. It means she's ready to unleash her stun.

riot_spell_q.name: Disintegrate
riot_spell_q.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
riot_spell_q.tooltip: Deals {{ basedamage }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Mana cost and half the cooldown are refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.

riot_spell_w.name: Incinerate
riot_spell_w.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Casts a cone of fire dealing {{ basedamage }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area.

riot_spell_e.name: Molten Shield
riot_spell_e.description: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Annie grants herself and Tibbers {{ damagereduction }}% damage reduction for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

While the shield is active, enemies who basic attack it take {{ damagereflection }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

riot_spell_r.name: Summon: Tibbers
riot_spell_r.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Summons Tibbers, dealing {{ initialdamage }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. For the next 45 seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for {{ auradamage }} (+{{ a2 }}) per second and attacks for {{ tibbersattackdamage }} (+{{ tibbersattackratio }}) as magic damage. Annie can control Tibbers by reactivating this ability.

Tibbers Enrages when: summoned; Annie uses Pyromania on an enemy Champion; and when Annie dies.

Enrages: Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Movement Speed, decaying over 3 seconds.

riot_spell_i.name: Pyromania
riot_spell_i.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Pyromania
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Annie''' gains a stack of ''Pyromania'' when she casts a spell, up to a maximum of 4. At 4 stacks, she gains ''Pyromania''.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|Pyromania:}} When '''Annie''' succeeds in her next '''damaging ability''', she consumes all ''Pyromania'' stacks and {{tip|stun|stuns}} enemies hit for {{pp|3|showtype=true|1.25 to 1.75|1 to 11}} seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* {{ai|Incinerate|Annie}} and {{ai|Summon: Tibbers|Annie}} will stun all enemies hit.
* {{ais|Molten Shield|Annie}} reflected damage and {{uis|Tibbers}} damaging aura will not apply the stun.
* The stun applies to the first ability that lands when the stun is available. If you cast {{ai|Disintegrate|Annie}} followed by {{ai|Incinerate|Annie}} while the stun is available and ''Incinerate'' lands first, the stun will be applied through ''Incinerate''.
* The stun '''will not''' be consumed if the target of {{ai|Disintegrate|Annie}} becomes untargetable or the projectile is destroyed by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}.
* Annie loses all ''Pyromania'' stacks when she is killed.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Disintegrate
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Annie''' hurls a fireball at the target enemy, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: If ''Disintegrate'' kills its target, it refunds {{as|its {{sti|mana}} cost}} and half of its {{sti|cooldown}} is immediately refreshed.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Incinerate
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Annie''' releases a cone of fire in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in the area.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Molten Shield
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Annie''' wraps herself and {{ui|Tibbers}} in a fiery aura, reducing damage taken for the next 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: Enemies who deal [[basic attack]] damage on '''Annie''' or {{ui|Tibbers}} during this time are dealt {{as|magic damage}}.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Molten Shield'' does not deal damage against towers and their attacks.
* Attacks that {{tip|blind|miss}} against '''Annie''' or {{ui|Tibbers}} will {{sbc|not}} cause the shield to deal damage.
